snippet.title: The World Ends with You Trailer
snippet.description: Japan's best selling game "It's a Wonderful World" is coming stateside! It will be released in Spring 2008 under the title "The World Ends with You." This is just the first Japanese trailer. Hopefully we'll have one in English soon. Enjoy!
